code: import React,{useEffect}from"react";import{makeStyles}from"@material-ui/core/styles";import{useSelector,useDispatch}from"react-redux";import loginActions from"../../redux/actions/loginActions";import Transactions from"../pages/Transactions";var useStyles=makeStyles({root:{display:"flex",flexDirection:"column",justifyContent:"space-evenly",alignItems:"center",margin:"100px auto ",width:"60%"},title:{color:"#a12bcc",textAlign:"center",margin:"0 auto 50px auto"},userBalance:{margin:"0 auto"}});var TransactionsContainer=function TransactionsContainer(props){var dispatch=useDispatch();useEffect(function(){dispatch(loginActions.persistUser());},[dispatch]);var classes=useStyles();var currentUser=useSelector(function(state){return state.login.currentUser;});var transactions=currentUser.transactions;var renderTransactions=function renderTransactions(){return transactions.map(function(transaction){return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Transactions,{key:transaction.id,transaction:transaction});});};return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:classes.root},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h1",{className:classes.title},"Transactions"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h5",{className:classes.userBalance},"Your Current Balance: $",currentUser.balance),renderTransactions());};export default TransactionsContainer;
